pr_title: fix(cordova): Don't add as system library if it's a vendored library

timeline.message: fix(cordova): Don't add as system library if it's a vendored library

timeline.author: imhoffd

replies.bodyText:
I have no preference on one syntax over the other, but yeah, we should decide one or the other and always use the same.
Won't change it for now, but we can do a refactor later that replaces all of them.
replies.author: jcesarmobile
